name: lexflow-zk-proofs
description: Zero-Knowledge Proof circuits for LexFlow Protocol (KYC, Conflict of Interest, Fulfillment Status)

scripts.compile:all: npm run compile:kyc && npm run compile:coi && npm run compile:fulfillment
scripts.setup:kyc: snarkjs groth16 setup build/kyc/kyc_verification.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau build/kyc/kyc_verification.zkey
scripts.setup:coi: snarkjs groth16 setup build/coi/conflict_of_interest.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau build/coi/conflict_of_interest.zkey
scripts.setup:fulfillment: snarkjs groth16 setup build/fulfillment/fulfillment_status.r1cs powersOfTau28_hez_final_10.ptau build/fulfillment/fulfillment_status.zkey
